message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $15000. I think you'll really love it, and I'm confident you'll get a great value out of it. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob, but I'm afraid $10000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $13000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $11000?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm still a bit above my minimum price. I'm willing to compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $12500. This is as low as I can go, but I think it's a fair price for the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11500?
